claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

verified_snippets.quote: Flublok contains recombinant HA proteins of the three strains of inﬂuenza virus speciﬁed by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.
verified_snippets.relevance_explanation: This quote supports the claim because it states that Flublok contains hemagglutinin (HA) proteins from the exact strains specified by health authorities (such as WHO and FDA) for the annual flu vaccine, ensuring an identical antigenic match.
verified_snippets.actual_text: Flublok contains recombinant HAproteins of the three strains of inﬂuenza virus speciﬁed by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.

verified_snippets.quote: For the 2024-2025 inﬂuenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 inﬂuenza virus strains: A/West Virginia/30/2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm09-like virus) (H1N1), A/Massachusetts/18/2022 (H3N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
verified_snippets.relevance_explanation: This quote provides the exact strains included in Flublok for the 2024-2025 season, which are the strains selected by WHO and FDA, directly supporting the claim of an identical antigenic match.
verified_snippets.actual_text: For the 2024-2025inﬂuenzaseasonit is formulatedtocontain135 mcgHA per 0.5 mLdose, with45 mcgHAof each of thefollowing3inﬂuenzavirusstrains:

verified_snippets.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements.
verified_snippets.relevance_explanation: This quote affirms that Flublok is produced to meet the official standards set by U.S. health authorities, which include using the exact strains selected for the season, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
